arts.ttl: Angry West Ham star Edson Alvarez 'threatened to kill' Chelsea's Enzo Fernandez during London derby spat
arts.sum: Seemingly angry with the way the game was going, Alvarez fouled Cole Palmer shortly after Chelsea's third goal. He was shown a yellow card by the referee but the drama did not end there.
